item.description:
CANDLEPIN BOWLING AND DINNER
TC: Leah My cell phone number so I can be reached the day of the event: 508-847-7410

EVENT: We'll enjoy two games of candlepin bowling and then head over to Not Your Average Joes for dinner.

MEET: We'll meet at the Acton Bowladrome at 3pm. They are located at 257 Main St. in Acton. Their phone number is 800-282-4697. We'll go out to dinner at 5pm. Not Your Average Joes is 305 Main St. in Acton.
RSVP to me thru Meetups by March 21. You can just do bowling or the dinner.
COST: $ 10 + $5 non-members (for 2 games and bowling shoes)
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP for the details by March 21st
item.why: It should be a fun afternoon with a great dinner out to complete the day

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: CANDLEPIN BOWLING AND DINNER
